dashboard.title: Business Overview
dashboard.noRevenueData: No revenue data for this period
dashboard.allItemsAboveThreshold: All items are above the alert threshold

revenue.title: Revenue
revenue.comprehensiveAnalysis: Comprehensive analysis of your business performance
revenue.breakdownOfRevenue: Breakdown of Gross Revenue, Returns, and final Net Revenue
revenue.trackingPaymentEfficiency: Tracking your payment efficiency for this period
revenue.moneyToReceive: Money you need to receive from customers
revenue.duesExplanation: Dues represent sales made on credit where customers haven't paid yet. This is money you will receive in the future when customers make payments.
revenue.efficiencyExplanation: Percentage of due sales collected in this period
revenue.understandingReturns: Understanding how returns impact your cash flow
revenue.cashRefundsExplanation: Money refunded to walk-in customers who returned products. This reduces your 'Total Collected' amount.
revenue.creditAdjustmentsExplanation: Returns from customers with credit accounts. No money was refunded - instead, their outstanding balance was reduced. This does NOT affect 'Total Collected'.
revenue.taxCollectedAndRefunded: Tax collected and refunded in this period
revenue.taxCollectedExplanation: Total tax amount collected from customers on sales made in this period.
revenue.taxRefundedExplanation: Tax amount refunded to customers when products were returned.
revenue.netTaxLiabilityExplanation: The actual tax amount you need to remit to authorities (Tax Collected - Tax Refunded).
revenue.creditReturnsNoCashOut: returns from credit customers (no cash out)
revenue.totalInstantSalesDesc: Total value of instant sales before deducting refunds
revenue.totalCreditSalesDesc: Total credit sales before deducting returns
revenue.greatJob: Great job! Keep up the momentum.
revenue.considerPromotion: Consider running a promotion to boost sales.
revenue.ofTotalRevenue: of the total revenue generated in this period
revenue.focusOnDues: Focus on following up with customers who have outstanding dues.
revenue.collectionGood: Your collection process is working well.
revenue.noMoneyCollected: No money collected in this period
revenue.comparePerformance: Compare performance across different time periods
revenue.trackAndAnalyzeTransactions: Track and analyze all revenue transactions
revenue.adjustFiltersHint: Try adjusting your filters or date range
revenue.name: Name
revenue.tryAdjustingDateRange: Try adjusting your date range or add some products
revenue.noPendingDues: No pending dues across selected categories
revenue.trackAndAnalyzeReturns: Track and analyze product returns and refunds
revenue.understandingReturnsImpact: Understanding how returns impact your cash flow
revenue.cashRefundsDesc: Money refunded to walk-in customers who returned products.
revenue.creditAdjustmentsDesc: Returns from customers with credit accounts.
revenue.exportError: Failed to export data. Please try again.

periodDesc.today: Today's hourly performance with payment status
periodDesc.week: This week's daily performance with payment status
periodDesc.month: This month's daily performance with payment status
periodDesc.quarter: This quarter's weekly performance with payment status
periodDesc.year: This year's monthly performance with payment status
periodDesc.all: All-time monthly performance with payment status

revenue.continueBuilding: Continue building momentum in all areas
revenue.considerStricterPolicies: Consider implementing stricter credit policies or offering early payment discounts.
revenue.focusOnRetention: Focus on customer retention and upselling opportunities.
revenue.transactionCountDecreased: Transaction count decreased. Consider running promotions or loyalty programs to drive more sales.
revenue.noReturnsFound: No returns found for the selected period

stock.searchForCustomerToProcess: Search for a customer to process their return
stock.cannotProceedWithErrors: Cannot proceed with these errors. Please adjust the return quantities or deselect the invoice.
